items.summary: Ensure that when an Agent registers, the registration is persisted in the backend in a way that makes the Agent immediately appear in the Admin pending-approval workflow.

Make `getAllAgentProfiles()` return an approval `status` that is consistent with the approval system (UserApproval state), so Admin UI filtering (pending/approved/rejected) works reliably for every agent profile.

Ensure Admin approval actions update the same underlying agent approval state that is displayed in Admin lists, so approving/rejecting a pending agent immediately moves the agent between Pending and Approved views.

Update the frontend Admin agent approval views to clearly surface backend fetch errors (e.g., authorization or failed query) instead of silently showing an empty pending list, so admins can distinguish "no pending agents" from "cannot load pending agents".
